Baseball Bat.name: Baseball Bat
Baseball Bat.description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies.

Big Knucks.name: Big Knucks
Big Knucks.description: Cyberware weapon. You must have the appropriate cyberware installed.

Bow.name: Bow
Bow.description: A revitalized bow that must be reloaded after every attack.

Chainsaw.name: Chainsaw
Chainsaw.description: A portable, refuelable saw that runs on CHOOH2. Lasts about 2-3 hours on one tank.

Crossbow.name: Crossbow
Crossbow.description: A crossbow which must be reloaded after every attack.

Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends.

Cybersnake.name: Cybersnake
Cybersnake.description: Cyberware weapon. You must have the appropriate cyberware installed.

Excellent Baseball Bat.name: Excellent Baseball Bat
Excellent Baseball Bat.description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Bow.name: Excellent Bow
Excellent Bow.description: A revitalized bow that must be reloaded after every attack. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Chainsaw.name: Excellent Chainsaw
Excellent Chainsaw.description: A portable, refuelable saw that runs on CHOOH2. Lasts about 2-3 hours on one tank. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Combat Knife.name: Excellent Combat Knife
Excellent Combat Knife.description: A knife fit for the streets. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Crossbow.name: Excellent Crossbow
Excellent Crossbow.description: A crossbow which must be reloaded after every attack. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Crowbar.name: Excellent Crowbar
Excellent Crowbar.description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Grenade Launcher.name: Excellent Grenade Launcher
Excellent Grenade Launcher.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Heavy SMG.name: Excellent Heavy SMG
Excellent Heavy SMG.description: A heavy SMG. Due to its size it can't be concealed. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Helicopter Blades.name: Excellent Helicopter Blades
Excellent Helicopter Blades.description: Taken from a derelict aircraft, these blades are capable of slicing most things easily. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Lead Pipe.name: Excellent Lead Pipe
Excellent Lead Pipe.description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Machete.name: Excellent Machete
Excellent Machete.description: A long-bladed knife with a variety of uses. Known to be a favourite to some gangs of Night City. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Naginata.name: Excellent Naginata
Excellent Naginata.description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Rocket Launcher.name: Excellent Rocket Launcher
Excellent Rocket Launcher.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Sledgehammer.name: Excellent Sledgehammer
Excellent Sledgehammer.description: A large mallet-like object with a flat metal head which distributes impacted force over a wide area. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Sniper Rifle.name: Excellent Sniper Rifle
Excellent Sniper Rifle.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Spiked Bat.name: Excellent Spiked Bat
Excellent Spiked Bat.description: An advancement over a regular bat. A number of nails have been hammered through towards the tip. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Sword.name: Excellent Sword
Excellent Sword.description: A bladed, hilted weapon. Specifically designed for cutting or thrusting. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Tomahawk.name: Excellent Tomahawk
Excellent Tomahawk.description: A light axe that can be thrown. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Very Heavy Pistol.name: Excellent Very Heavy Pistol
Excellent Very Heavy Pistol.description: A very heavy pistol. It can't be concealed. +1 to Attack.

Grenade Launcher.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this.

Poor Assault Rifle.name: Poor Assault Rifle
Poor Assault Rifle.description: A standard-issue assault rifle. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Poor Baseball Bat.name: Poor Baseball Bat
Poor Baseball Bat.description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.
